document.full_text: american jonathan byrd flew by compatriot pat perez with a blistering back nine to seize a one-stroke lead after saturday's third round of the quail hollow championship on an emotional day in the wake of the seve ballesteros's death.
document.title: byrd streaks into lead, ballesteros remembered
lines_and_colors: american jonathan byrd flew by compatriot pat perez with a blistering back nine to seize a one-stroke lead after saturday's third round of the quail hollow championship on an emotional day in the wake of the seve ballesteros's death.
